simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Registers a new prefix for the XSH2 namespace http://xsh.sourceforge.net/xsh/. The prefix can later be used in XPath expressions. Note, that XSH2 namespace is by default registered with the prefix xsh. This command is thus, in general, useful only when some document uses xsh prefix for a different namespace or if you want a shorter prefix.
